replies.body: Hm, this is a very hard question, but here I go xD. There first time I ever went on Avicus was about 2 years ago or so. It was still MCZone and I wanted to play Nebula. I won't ever really know who the first person I met was, but I remember meeting Vice around a year or go? (Something like that). He was one of my first close friends on the server.

replies.body: Opinions on me?
replies.body_tagged: Opinions on me?

replies.body:
@ DeliciousShoesHD
-Such a nice and amazing staff member. I love our reporter group chat, R.I.P. Actylon.
- I don't know ^-^, depends on if I get some support :P.
- I'm doing really good thanks!

@ ElementalAssasin
- I've talked to you a couple times, your really fun to talk to. Haven't really played. But you seem pretty good.
- I'm thinking about it ^-^

@ StupidlyClever
- I'm really hoping that Lokigh, Tigger, Buster and Xtra all apply and get "Acceqted" :3.
- Awesome person, amazing and skillful fighter in minecraft. Fun to talk to =)

@ Centralking
- Neon green
- Probably Cotton Candy or Live wires =D
- I'm actually a super competitive dancer, you can watch me here ->  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wbRAPO1djx0
- Your a really cool guy that's really good at pvp. I'm hoping you will get accepted into Cronus ^-^.

@ Clijmart
- Hmm.. I'm gonna pick a couple. And even though I like almost every staff member, here are my favourite! Arigenn, Kyler, Sli, Vo, Rese, Jess, Jahaj, Cammy, Delicious <3, Myworld, Seth, Zeusy, Irone and Sulorak!
- Quintus..... Or Wahiz :D
- Awesome guy that's willing to help, I hope to see you as a staff member some day!

@ Fauin
- One of my closest friends online, hilarious and can always make me laugh. We should talk more ^-^.
- Hm... I really like Inside Out :3
- Not really :/
- Starbucks *Cue white girl*

@ Borrah
- Your super awesome and your selfies are goals, love having you around on Cronus. We should talk more!
- Ergh... To many, refer to the ones above.

@ Zeusy
- Amazing staff member! We haven't talked that much but I've seen you around. Well deserved senior moderator that does his job with passion and smarts. We should talk!

@ MeMyselfAndRyan
- Good defender, haven't talked to you in a while but your fun to talk to otherwise.
- Pizza Pizza =D

@ myworld6
- Neon green
- Wahiz
- Cool staff member! We aren't really on the same times, so I don't talk to you so much. Pleaseeee talk in teamspeakk :C.
- Yas Cheespuffs <3
- Dobby

@ FrostedCupcakez
- Hey Famm <33
- One of my favourite mods, your selfies are my life goals basically. Love our snapchats... streak :cc. We should talk more! Meetup 2K16 :p ?
- Mashed Potatoes obv.

@ NovaLikesPvP
- Haven't ever really talked to you on teamspeak, but I'm almost positive I've scrimmed against you. Your a PvP G0d and your team is goals. We should talk sometime =

@ alexanderjoe
- Uh... My phone XD
- Cool guy, haven't talked to you in a while. Think I may retire from ONET :(.

- Cool guy. Congrats on getting into China Baby Toes. We should talk more.
